name: GameJam LD31: Mr Snowman visits Forbidden Temple
name_original: GameJam LD31: Mr Snowman visits Forbidden Temple
description:
Ludum Dare 31 48 hour compo entry for 'Entire game on one screen' theme.

CONTROLS: Click where you want to go. Drag to rotate map.

Help Mr Snowman explore the FORBIDDEN TEMPLE in search of the MAGIC ICECUBE so he can stay cool in this exciting adventure for children of all ages*!

*Not suitable for children.

If (when) you get stuck, there is something like a map available at http://pixelsyntax.com/mrsnowmanguide/
